item.dc:creator: @Quintorz Quintorz
item.description:
@Quintorz wrote:

Pure_:

That just sends the display ground item packet, you need to bind it to your item handler (ie, uncomment the previous two lines and fill out the function parameters).

uhmm ive had a long break from rsps so kinda help :D? please
i uncommented the 2 lines but still the same

item.title: Winterlove Global items help!
item.dc:creator: @Quintorz Quintorz
item.description:
@Quintorz wrote:

So i have a old winterlove server that i started to code a lil on… and then i created a command to spawn a whip on the ground at a certain location… but the strange thing is … i cnt pick it up

this is the creategrounditem method

public void createGroundItem(int itemID, int itemX, int itemY, int itemAmount) {// Phate: Omg fucking sexy! creates item at absolute X and Y outStream.createFrame(85); // Phate: Spawn ground item outStream.writeByteC((itemY - 8 * mapRegionY)); outStream.writeByteC((itemX - 8 * mapRegionX)); outStream.createFrame(44); outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(itemID); outStream.writeWord(itemAmount); outStream.writeByte(0); }

and this is the command i used:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("testing")){ //ItemHandler.spawnItem(4151, 3305, 9195, 1, 2); //ItemHandler.createItemAll(4151, 3304, 9195, 1, 1); createGroundItem(4151, 3304, 9195, 1);//This one... why cnt i pick it up? And its doin the same thing with all the other "methods" :/ }

video here
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vNmc5UWChuc[/youtube]

Read full topic
